title: 两个关于Ess的问题
author: wutong10086
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wutong10086 于 2019-4-4 22:53 编辑 

plugins : EssX,EssXProtect,EssXSpawn(最后构建)
服务端 : PaperSpigot1.13.2(最后构建)
配置文件已全为默认

问题1.非OP玩家无法使用类似tpa,sethome等Ess基础指令(补充:You do not have access to that command)
问题2.kits物品是否可添加药水效果？如果可以如何编辑(格式)？(补充：装备在装备栏生效)

总回答 : (1)装权限组插件;不支持   (2)直接改plugin.yml(简单粗暴);不支持[已最佳]

经过LZ仔细翻阅config.yml，找到了问题所在
# In this example someone with 'essentials.sethome.multiple' and 'essentials.sethome.multiple.vip' will have 5 homes.
# Remember, they MUST have both permission nodes in order to be able to set multiple homes.
# Controls whether players need the permission "essentials.home.compass" in order to point
# the player's compass at their first home.
# Leaving this as false will retain Essentials' original behaviour, which is to always
# change the compass' direction to point towards their first home.
compass-towards-home-perm: false

replies.author: fancymimis
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 浅弱ら晓雨 于 2019-4-3 23:39 编辑 

简单的说一下吧，就是用压缩软件打开插件核心，然后打开里面的plugin.yml文件进行编辑，然后用编辑器的搜索功能找到essentials.sethome等权限，然后右边的改成true，但是不要全部都改成true，不然会让玩家拥有ess的所有权限
